heading: Elevate Your Digital Presence
description: I develop high-performance, scalable, and visually captivating web applications that drive meaningful results for your business.
call_to_action: Ready to build something extraordinary? Contact me today and let's get started.

sidebar.name: Shlomi
sidebar.description: I'm passionate about crafting innovative, high-performance web solutions that align with your unique business objectives. With expertise in Node.js, React, Next.js, and PostgreSQL, I deliver powerful, scalable results that fuel growth.

contact.title: Let's Build Something Remarkable
contact.description: I specialize in creating high-performance, scalable applications that propel businesses forward. Whether you need a custom web solution, want to optimize an existing project, or seek a partner in cutting-edge tech—I'm here to help. Let's connect and bring your vision to life!

projects.title: Some of My Work
projects.description: Take a look at a selection of projects I've been involved in—from freelance collaborations to in-depth case studies that highlight my problem-solving and technical expertise.
